subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick held off a late challenge by Carl Edwards at New Hampshire International Speedway yesterday to grab his second Nascar Busch Series victory of the season. Harvick, who had not won since the opening weekend at Daytona, led 166 laps.During the postrace inspection, Nascar confiscated an unapproved shock absorber from Edwards’s Ford. Officials said any penalty would be announced next week.
